verses.text: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* anything. \w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* unclean, \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* evil \w works|strong="H6213"\w*; \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w who|strong="H0369"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w gone|strong="H0369"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* unclean, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w no|strong="H0369"\w*, \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*? \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H0954"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* support.
